title: [German, S2/G5] Midlaner Looking for Duo Partner
body:
Hi there :) 

I'm Tobi and long range control mage midlane main my mostplayed champions are Karthus (130k) Viktor (~80k) Ziggs (70k), Ap kogmaw and orianna (80k)

Well i am looking for people to have fun with and climb up to gold/plat again, i am currently Gold 5 in Flexi and Silver 2 in Duo

Actually i think the main problem i have is people around me die to much -.- i am a REALLY good farmer, so i get strong anyway, but my powerspikes are just useless if bot and top died ~10 times in 20 minutes

So if you think you are fun to play with, just shoot me an ingame message: SOLAMNTE and lets have a lil chat, pls have either discord TS,  skype or something

I speak english and german fluently

kind regards
Tobi

replies.body:
"long range control mage midlane main [...] Karthus"
Nigga wat :D

Na hätte ich gewusst dass das dann nur im deutschen Forum erscheint hätte ich auch gleich auf Deutsch schreiben können :D

was ein ärger x)

grüße
